Issue.creator: jimthematrix
Issue.summary: Allow fabric-ca-client to have per-instance crypto settings
Issue.description: used to be that in order to use a non-default crypto setting for fabric-ca-client, the app has to call setConfigSetting() to set various config setting values (crypto-keysize, crypto-hash-algo, etc.). this is clunky. it really should be a per-instance parameter on the constructor call.
